itemDescription: Most senior rating of the Royal Navy

wikipedia_page.main: Steven P. Cass is a retired warrant officer 1 of the Royal Navy. From 2013 to 2017, he was the Warrant Officer of the Naval Service (now Warrant Officer of the Royal Navy) and, therefore, the most senior rating of the Royal Navy. He is the first person from the Fleet Air Arm and the second person overall to hold the appointment.

response: In July 2010, Casey was appointed Warrant Officer of the Naval Service. In that role he attended all Navy Board meetings as an observer. He was appointed a Member of the Order of the British Empire in the 2013 Queen's Birthday Honours, and was succeeded as Warrant Officer of the Naval Service in December that year by Warrant Officer Class 1 Steve Cass.
